Heyy guys!! Aircel Mumbai Stores are now located in our LIVE tab, Click on the location closest to you to get directions, where you can:

> Get Prepaid connections and recharge cards
> View demos and activate Value Added Services
> Get information on the latest recharges
> Have your queries answered, SIM replaced and much more.
Go check it out, it's time to move on!

http://www.facebook.com/AircelMumbai?sk=app_106878476015645&app_data=page-16
One hundred FREE Twenty20 tickets to be won this premier league season!! to get urs click here: http://on.fb.me/kY84dH
